response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 to us, reflecting its unique features and benefits. Considering its unparalleled capabilities, I kindly invite you to consider acquiring it at this exclusive price. We believe in making extraordinary experiences accessible to those who appreciate them. Let's discuss how we can make this remarkable opportunity yours.", "product_price": 12000}
